thread.title: Landslide buries a whole village in Manipur
thread.title_full: Landslide buries a whole village in Manipur

author: Prakaant
title: Landslide buries a whole village in Manipur
text: India Mike » India Travel » States in India » Manipur » Landslide buries a whole village in Manipur Landslide buries a whole village in Manipur # 1 Landslide buries a whole village, Joumol, a small Kuki-dominated hamlet under Khengjoy block in the remote Joupi area of Manipur's Chandel district bordering Myanmar on Saturday, 1st August."The exact number of casualties would be known after the evacuation work is complete. So far, we have learnt that 20 villagers were killed while one survived in the worst ever landslide in Manipur in the recent times," an official said.
